import React from "react" class Formapp extends React.Component{ constructor(){ super() this.state = { firstName: "", lastName: "", age: 0, gender: "male", destination: "", dietaryRestrictions: [] } this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this) } handleChange(event){ const {name, value, type, checked} = event.target type === "checkbox" ? this.setState({ [name]: checked }) : this.setState({ [name]: value }) } render() { return(

{this.state.favColor}

) } } export default Formapp
